body.name: CushyOasis Memory Foam Pillows for Side, Back and Stomach Sleepers, Cooling Pillow with Washable Cover and Breathable Mesh, Bed Pillow for Sleeping Standard Size (Grey)

climatePledgeFriendly.details: OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 requires textiles-based products to be tested against a list of 1,000+ chemicals, to limit those which may be harmful to human health. Certification focus: #ProductSafety and #ChemicalsUsed.

features: 【💝Memory Foam】CushyOasis bed pillow is made of premium memory foam, soft but supportive Whether you're side sleepers, back sleepers or stomach sleepers, it can fit and support your head and neck curves well, so that you can eliminate your fatigue and spend the whole night in a peaceful sleep.
【💝Easy to Clean】Pillowcase can be easily disassembled and changed, while the fabric of the pillowcase is breathable and cool, which can well dissipate heat and moisture and speed up air circulation.

【💝Ergonomic Design】CushyOasis memory foam pillow uses your weight to naturally stretch and pull to conform to your body's curves, which improves the quality of your sleep and avoids headaches, snoring, and neck pain.

【💝Multiple Options for You to Choose】CushyOasis have three different sizes of pillows: standard size of 25 * 16.2 * 5 inch, queen size of 29 * 16.2 * 5 inch, king size of 35.5 * 16.2 * 5 inch, you can surely find the most suitable for you in so many sizes.
【💝Great Gift Choice】Memory foam material can effectively improve shoulder and neck pain, reduce insomnia and sleeplessness, it is the ideal gift for your family and friends.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The support of this pillow is amazing!!!
reviews.reviewText: This memory foam pillow has truly revolutionized my sleep experience. It’s hands down the best pillow I’ve ever owned. The level of support it provides is unparalleled, cradling my head and neck in perfect alignment. The memory foam contours to my shape, offering a personalized comfort that ensures a restful night’s sleep. The quality craftsmanship is evident, and the hypoallergenic material is a welcome bonus. Say goodbye to tossing and turning – this pillow is a game-changer for anyone seeking comfort and support in their sleep routine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good for all sleep positions
reviews.reviewText: The pillow came nicely packaged. After opening it, I was surprised at how it fluffed up in only a few minutes. I did notice a slight chemical smell originally but it dissipated quickly and after an hour or two, the smell was completely gone. The pillow is well constructed and I like the removable cover with zipper. I am a side sleeper but I shift to different positions throughout the night. I felt the pillow was comfortable for all positions. For my main position of side sleeping, the memory foam was firm enough to support the position, but soft enough to form to my body. It supported my natural posture so I was comfortable throughout the night. Some pillows get very hot from body heat, but this one stayed nice and cool. I woke up after a well rested sleep and felt no discomfort in my neck or back as I have with other pillows in the past. I would recommend this pillow and would purchase again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: One thing about me is that I am very particular about my pillow. Seriously, it’s a problem. I kept the same pillow for years (gross, I know) because I didn’t know where to get another just like it and I looked everywhere. I would not travel without this pillow. I left it at a friends house out of town once and could not sleep well until I got it back! I saw a deal for this on Amazon, and I thought I’d give it a try. Couldn’t hurt. Best. Decision. Ever. It immediately replaced my favorite pillow, as well as the pillow I kept underneath it because it wasn’t thick enough to support my neck. This pillow is perfect by itself, as it provides the perfect amount of support! Needless to say, I tossed out the old one and now I know where to replace it when the new one gets old! Great purchase!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This pillow surprised me. I find with a lot of these solid memory foam pillows they end up being too thick, firm, etc for me to be comfortable using them. This one however seems pretty perfect. It is supportive yet I sink in enough so my neck isn't at an angle. Just what I have been looking for. The only reason I gave it 4 stars is because I wish they would also include the thin cover over the foam piece, like some do, so it is easier to remove and replace the outer cover when washing etc. I would definitely recommend giving this a try. And it's a good price too. :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY
reviews.reviewText: Love Amazon, but this product was a complete waste of my money. Soon as you open the package you have to give the pillow time to inflate, which is understandable, but the horrible smell that emanates from the pillow is unbearable. It smells like straight chemicals. So I figured I’ll wash the cover, maybe that will help. Problem there is the zipper sucks! It was hard to unzip (and yes I did the pinch and hold technique) and when I go to zip the pillow back up it breaks on the track. I haven’t even washed it yet and already the item defective. I wish I could return this pillow and get my money back because I won’t be using it. Absolutely zero stars.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this pillow
reviews.reviewText: The pillow comes vacuum sealed. You may have some doubts about it. There is a slight smell and you can't see how a thin piece of fabric can turn into a pillow like the one in the photo. But alas, it fills up in time (around 3-5 hours) and the smell goes away by the second sleep!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not a soft, cushy pillow, but I sleep well on it.
reviews.reviewText: I have 2 top-brand pillows that are very soft foam which I love, but they are exorbitantly expensive. I tried this to see what a reasonable price could buy. In the past, most regular foam pillows have felt essentially like bricks to me. This does not. It is much firmer than my beloved expensive foam pillows, but it is squishy enough that I actually sleep fine on it, which surprised me. So if you know you like a foam pillow, this is probably a medium softness one and the price is reasonable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Soft and comfortable, and price is affordable. Two thumbs up!
